
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

Here's the J model: 


```{r}
p1 <- 1
p2 <- 100
p3 <- 1
p4 <- 10
f <- function(x) - p1 * x ^ 2 -  p2 / (p3 + x)  + p4 * x 
```

Hello multiple stable states: 

```{r}
x = seq(1,10, .01)
df <- data.frame(x, f= f(x))
ggplot(df, aes(x,f)) + geom_line() + geom_hline(yintercept = 0)
```

Bye Bye stable state, hello collpase

```{r}
p4 <- 8
df <- data.frame(x, f= f(x))
ggplot(df, aes(x,f)) + geom_line() + geom_hline(yintercept = 0)
```
